columns.Scientist: The unique identifier of the scientist involved in the project.
columns.Project: The code identifying the project assigned to the scientist.

AssignedTo.table_description: The table tracks the assignments of scientists to projects.

columns.SSN: The unique identifier of each scientist.
columns.Name: The full name of the scientist.

Scientists.table_description: The table stores information about individual scientists.

columns.Code: The unique identifier for each project.
columns.Name: The title or description of the project.
columns.Hours: The total hours allocated for the project.

Projects.table_description: The table manages information related to various projects.
